fields.name: animationDuration
fields.desc: Determines the transition time for each destination as it goes between selected and unselected.

fields.name: selectedIndex
fields.desc: Determines which one of the [destinations] is currently selected.

fields.name: destinations
fields.desc: The list of destinations (usually [NavigationDestination]s) in this [NavigationBar].

fields.name: onDestinationSelected
fields.desc: Called when one of the [destinations] is selected.

fields.name: shadowColor
fields.desc: The color used for the drop shadow to indicate elevation.

fields.name: surfaceTintColor
fields.desc: The color used as an overlay on [backgroundColor] to indicate elevation.

fields.name: indicatorColor
fields.desc: The color of the [indicatorShape] when this destination is selected.

fields.name: indicatorShape
fields.desc: The shape of the selected indicator.

fields.name: labelBehavior
fields.desc: Defines how the [destinations]' labels will be laid out and when they'll be displayed.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The highlight color that's typically used to indicate that the [NavigationDestination] is focused, hovered, or pressed.

fields.name: labelTextStyle
fields.desc: / The text style of the label.

fields.name: maintainBottomViewPadding
fields.desc: Specifies whether the underlying [SafeArea] should maintain the bottom [MediaQueryData.viewPadding] instead of the bottom [MediaQueryData.padding].
